entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Mentioned as someone who might be angry if he knew about the information. Excerpt: "I can’t believe Dumbledore would have been angry..."

entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: Mentioned as something that they are not going to make using the information. Excerpt: "it’s not as though we’re going to use the information to make a Horcrux"

entities.name: books
entities.description: Mentioned as what they are looking for. Excerpt: "Where are these books anyway?"

relationships.description: Hermione is searching for the books. Excerpt: "Hermione rummaged for a moment and then extracted from 102 The Ghoul in Pajamas"
Ron is making complaints. Excerpt: "Can you hear us complaining?"
